component.name: Bunsenite
component.summary: Nickel configuration file parser with multi-language FFI bindings

description.p: Bunsenite is a Nickel configuration file parser with multi-language FFI bindings. It provides a Rust core library with a stable C ABI layer that enables bindings for Deno, Rescript, and WebAssembly.

ul.li: Type Safety: Compile-time guarantees via Rust's type system
Memory Safety: Rust ownership model, zero unsafe blocks
Multi-Language: FFI bindings for Deno, Rescript, and WASM
